actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to extend the deadline for seeking assistance with regard to disaster relief under the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act.

summary.text: Extends for 45 days after the date of enactment of this Act the deadline for seeking assistance with regard to disaster relief under the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act.

titles.title: A bill to extend the deadline for seeking assistance with regard to disaster relief under the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act.
